```{r results = "asis"}

show_plot <- function(plot_object) {
  div(style="margin:auto;text-align:center", plot_object)
}

# big for loop over each species
for (iterate_species in c("setosa", "versicolor", "virginica")) {

cat("  \n##", iterate_species, " {.tabset}", "  \n")
  
cat("  \n###", "Fig 1","  \n")

p1 <- datatable(iris %>% filter(Species == iterate_species))

show_plot(print(p1))

cat("  \n###", "Fig 2","  \n")

p2 <- datatable(iris %>% filter(Species == iterate_species))

show_plot(print(p2))


}

```
